scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:hint && yarn build:utils && yarn build:connectors && npm-run-all --parallel build::parser:* && yarn build:utils-test && loop "yarn build" --cwd packages/ --exclude configuration-progressive-web-apps,configuration-web-recommended,connector-edge,hint,utils-debugging-protocol-common,utils-connector-tools,utils-tests-helpers,connector-chrome,connector-jsdom,parser-babel-config,parser-javascript,parser-manifest,parser-typescript-config,parser-webpack-config
scripts.build:connectors: yarn build:connector-edge && yarn build:connector-chrome && yarn build:connector-jsdom
scripts.build:connector-edge: node -e "process.platform !== 'win32' && process.exit(1);" && (cd packages/connector-edge && yarn build) || echo ""
scripts.build:scripts: npm run clean:root && npm run lint:scripts && npm-run-all --parallel build:scripts:*
scripts.build:utils: yarn build:utils-server && yarn build:utils-connector && yarn build:utils-cdp
scripts.pre-release: npm run clean:packages && npm run build:scripts && npm run release -- --prerelease
scripts.release: npm run clean:packages && npm run build:scripts && node dist/scripts/release.js
scripts.test-root: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm-run-all --parallel build:scripts:*
scripts.watch:scripts:non-ts: npm run build:scripts:non-ts && npm run build:scripts:non-ts --watch --no-initial
